analysis.description:
Reentrancy in VeraCoinPreSale.refund (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#354-369):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#357-360)
	External calls sending eth:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.send(refund)) (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#364-367)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- refunded (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#367)

VeraCoinPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#376-393) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0

Reentrancy in VeraCoinPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#376-393):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#392-393)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- collected (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol)

VeraCoinPreSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#369-376) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#371-373)

VeraCoinPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#376-393) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol)

VeraCoinPreSale.refund.refund (local variable @ /unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#361-362) shadows:
	- VeraCoinPreSale.refund (function @ /unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#354-369)

Reentrancy in VeraCoinPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#376-393):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#392-393)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol)

Reentrancy in VeraCoinPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#376-393):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#392-393)
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol)

Reentrancy in VeraCoinPreSale.refund (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#354-369):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#357-360)
	External calls sending eth:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.send(refund)) (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#364-367)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRefunded (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#367-368)

Reentrancy in VeraCoinPreSale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#369-376):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#371-373)

	- require(bool)(beneficiary.send(collected)) (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#371)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleFinished (/unique_chucks/10/0xa5e9fd547d78f2b658ae6c45ad08d9ab432c797c.sol#373-374)
